short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The resources in this extension can help you navigate to the most common places on the website you may need at Clark.

long.ar,de,es,fr,he,ja,ru,uk: The resources in this extension can help you navigate to the most common places on the websites you may need at Clark College.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: This extension now supports Arabic, French, German, Hebrew, Japanese, Persian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, and Ukrainian languages.
long.fa: This extension now supports Spanish, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Hebrew, Russian, Japanese, Arabic, Ukrainian, and French languages.
